message.raw:
Added a global variable to the lyse module called spinning_top. If it's True, then the script is being run from within lyse (the application). If false then the lyse module is being imported from a script being run outside of the lyse application.

Also have overridden matplotlib.pyplot.show() such that calls to show() are ignored when not running from within the lyse application
